hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sirmah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever harms others, Allah (SWT) will harm him; and whoever causes hardship to other Allah will cause hardship to him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَنَى فِي حَقِّهِ مَا يَضُرُّ بِجَارِهِ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Builds Something On His Own Property That Harms His Neighbor
